cells.data:
If you listen to only one podcast on this list:

  • My Dad Wrote a Porno 
    • Comedy
    • Rated R - adult content - can get you fired if you play on speakers
    • this guy named Jamie’s father wrote an erotic novel and it’s so bad - it’s good

By Category

  • Politics 
    • Pod Save America - liberal-leaning political conversation hosted by Obama speak writers and spokesman
    • Lovett or Leave It - one of Pod Save America’s host is a stand up comedian - every episode is a live show featuring other comedians and reporters and general cool people in the zeigeist
    • Pod Save the World - another POA’s host is a foreign policy junkie and he interviews experts in the crazy stuff happening in the world (North Korea)
    • Real Time with Bill Maher - audio of his weekly talk show
    • Intercepted with Jeremy Scahill - they were the first to curse out Trump
  • Horror
    • Unexplained - supernatural, horror stories
    • The Black Tapes - season 1 and 3 only; season 2 is the Lost finale in 10 parts
  • Miscellaneous
    • Terms - alternate universe where Trump-like character gets elected. what do we do?!?!?!??!!?!??!?!!?!?!!??!?!?!?!!
    • The Daily - daily brief of what’s important to know in the world
    • Stuff You Should Know - random things you would never sit down to read up on
    • Stuff You Missed in History - history if you’re interested
  • Science
    • StarTalk Radio - because Neil deGrasse Tyson
